net.edzard.kinetic

Class Box2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edzard.kinetic.Box2d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Box2d
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data quadruple. Used for, e.g. rectangles or bounding boxes.
    Author:
    Ed
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isInside

        public final boolean isInside(Vector2d point)
        Check if a point is within the bounds of the box. Takes unset boundaries (fields assigned with Double.NaN) into account.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to evaluate
        Returns:
        True, if the given point is within or on the boundaries of the box. False, otherwise.

      • correctOffset

        public final void correctOffset(Vector2d offset)
        Corrects the box by some offset value.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset value to use for correction
